tasks.description: Find the store's policy on returning a book you ordered online.
Create a new account using your email address.
Browse for science fiction books by a specific author (Isaac Asimov) and add one to your wishlist.
required_steps: Use the filter or search bar to narrow results by author 'Isaac Asimov'

tasks.description: Update your account password and add a shipping address to your address book.
required_steps: Find the 'Change Password' section and update it
Click 'Add New Address' and fill in the details
Apply a filter to sort by 'Highest Rated' or filter for '4 stars & up'
Select a promising book to view its detail page
Scroll to and read at least two customer reviews

tasks.description: Proceed through the checkout process to purchase the items in your shopping cart using a credit card.
required_steps: Review the order summary and place the order

tasks.description: Initiate a return for an order you received last week and print the return shipping label.
required_steps: Locate the specific order from last week
Select the item and the reason for return
Follow the prompts to generate a return shipping label

pages.name: Home
pages.description: Landing page with navigation, search bar, featured books, and category browsing.

pages.name: Product Category
pages.description: Displays a list of products within a specific category (e.g., Science Fiction, Mystery) with filtering and sorting options.

pages.name: Product Detail
pages.description: Displays detailed product information, price, and options to add to cart or wishlist. Includes customer reviews.

pages.name: Login
pages.description: Page for existing users to log into their accounts.

pages.name: Registration
pages.description: Page for new users to create an account using their email address.

pages.name: Account Overview
pages.description: Dashboard for logged-in users to access order history, wishlist, and account settings.

pages.name: Account Settings
pages.description: Sub-page for managing account details, including password changes.

pages.name: Address Book
pages.description: Page to view, add, edit, and delete shipping addresses.

pages.name: Wishlist
pages.description: Page displaying the user's saved wishlist items.

pages.name: Shopping Cart
pages.description: Page displaying items added to the shopping cart, with options to update quantities and proceed to checkout.

pages.name: Checkout
pages.description: Multi-step process for selecting shipping address, payment method, and reviewing the order before purchase.

pages.name: Order Confirmation
pages.description: Page displayed after a successful order, confirming the order details.

pages.name: Order History
pages.description: Page listing all past orders for the logged-in user, with links to view details and initiate returns.

pages.name: Order Detail
pages.description: Page showing detailed information for a specific order, including items and status. Includes option to start a return.

pages.name: Return Process
pages.description: Page to initiate a return for an item, select reason, and generate a return shipping label.

pages.name: Customer Service
pages.description: Hub for help topics, including links to policies like returns and refunds.

task_instruction: Browse, purchase, and manage your book collection and account on the online_bookstore website.
